overview: Girls loving girls is complicated...and beyond sexy! Sweet, lighthearted Kenna James learns to take charge when lover Adira Allure demands to be dominated. Nudist Alyx Star teaches roommate Vanna Bardot how to be comfortable in her own skin. Scarlit Scandal needs to know if she is just a hookup for Maddy May. Kylie Rocket and Gizelle Blanco turn an uncomfortable situation into an encounter to remember.
title: Girls Lovin' Girls
